The input voltage \(v_I\) is the sum of a DC bias voltage \(V_I\) and a sinusoid of the form \(v_i=A \sin(\omega t)\), where \(A\) is very small compared to \(V_I\). The output voltage \(v_O\) is the sum of a DC bias term \(V_O\) and a small-signal response term \(v_o\).
